UPDATE funding_express SET funding_express_name = #{funding_express_name}, funding_express_phone = #{funding_express_phone}, funding_express_postnum = #{funding_express_postnum}, funding_express_addr1 = #{funding_express_addr1}, funding_express_addr2 = #{funding_express_addr2} WHERE funding_order_idx = #{funding_order_idx}
